  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.AdaptiveMediaSourceEventListener
    Use MediaSourceEventListener.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.EventListener
    Use Player.EventListener instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ExtractorMediaSource.EventListener
    Use MediaSourceEventListener.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.metadata.MetadataRenderer.Output
    Use MetadataOutput.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.PlaybackControlView.ControlDispatcher
    Use ControlDispatcher.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.SingleSampleMediaSource.EventListener
    Use MediaSourceEventListener.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.text.TextRenderer.Output
    Use TextOutput.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ext.ima.ImaAdsMediaSource
    Use com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource with ImaAdsLoader.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.PlaybackControlView.DEFAULT_CONTROL_DISPATCHER
    Use DefaultControlDispatcher.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.REPEAT_MODE_ALL
    Use Player.REPEAT_MODE_ALL instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.REPEAT_MODE_OFF
    Use Player.REPEAT_MODE_OFF instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.REPEAT_MODE_ONE
    Use Player.REPEAT_MODE_ONE instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.STATE_BUFFERING
    Use Player.STATE_BUFFERING instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.STATE_ENDED
    Use Player.STATE_ENDED instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.STATE_IDLE
    Use Player.STATE_IDLE instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayer.STATE_READY
    Use Player.STATE_READY instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.Factory.clearAllDefaultRequestProperties()
    Use HttpDataSource.Factory.getDefaultRequestProperties() instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.BaseFactory.clearAllDefaultRequestProperties()
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.Factory.clearDefaultRequestProperty(String)
    Use HttpDataSource.Factory.getDefaultRequestProperties() instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.BaseFactory.clearDefaultRequestProperty(String)
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.clearMetadataOutput(MetadataOutput)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.removeMetadataOutput(MetadataOutput).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.clearTextOutput(TextOutput)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.removeTextOutput(TextOutput).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.clearVideoListener(SimpleExoPlayer.VideoListener)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.removeVideoListener(VideoListener).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.drm.DrmInitData.get(UUID)
    Use DrmInitData.get(int) and DrmInitData.SchemeData.matches(UUID) instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.getAudioStreamType()
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.getAudioAttributes().
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(Context, TrackSelector, LoadControl)
    Use ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(RenderersFactory, TrackSelector, LoadControl).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(Context, TrackSelector, LoadControl, DrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto>)
    Use ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(RenderersFactory, TrackSelector, LoadControl).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(Context, TrackSelector, LoadControl, DrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto>, int)
    Use ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(RenderersFactory, TrackSelector, LoadControl).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(Context, TrackSelector, LoadControl, DrmSessionManager<FrameworkMediaCrypto>, int, long)
    Use ExoPlayerFactory.newSimpleInstance(RenderersFactory, TrackSelector, LoadControl).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setAudioDebugListener(AudioRendererEventListener)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.addAudioDebugListener(AudioRendererEventListener).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setAudioStreamType(int)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.setAudioAttributes(AudioAttributes).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.Factory.setDefaultRequestProperty(String, String)
    Use HttpDataSource.Factory.getDefaultRequestProperties() instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.HttpDataSource.BaseFactory.setDefaultRequestProperty(String, String)
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setMetadataOutput(MetadataOutput)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.addMetadataOutput(MetadataOutput).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setPlaybackParams(PlaybackParams)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.setPlaybackParameters(PlaybackParameters).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setTextOutput(TextOutput)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.addTextOutput(TextOutput).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setVideoDebugListener(VideoRendererEventListener)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.addVideoDebugListener(VideoRendererEventListener).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.SimpleExoPlayer.setVideoListener(SimpleExoPlayer.VideoListener)
    Use SimpleExoPlayer.addVideoListener(VideoListener).
